data.question: What is the empirical formula of UMCM-3?
What technique was used for X-ray diffraction data collection for UMCM-3 and UMCM-4?
data.answer: Rigaku-Axis Spider diffractometer equipped with graphite monochromated CuKα radiation

data.question: What is the BET surface area of UMCM-4 as determined by N2 adsorption isotherm?
How was the pore size distribution for UMCM-3 determined?
data.answer: Using the Non-linear Density Functional Theory (NLDFT) zeolite/silica equilibrium transition kernel for Ar adsorption at 87 K based on a cylindrical pore model

data.question: What was the yield of the reaction for the synthesis of UMCM-3, based on H3BTB?
Is the crystal system of UMCM-3 cubic?
Does UMCM-4 have a higher BET surface area than UMCM-3?
Was the coordination mode of UMCM-4 solved in the orthorhombic space group Pnma?
What was the method used for the quantification of PHT in UMCM-1?
data.answer: UV-Vis spectroscopy after decomposition of the UMCM-1 framework and extraction with chlorobenzene

data.question: What was the molecular weight (Mn) of PHT in UMCM-1 as determined by GPC analysis?
Is the space group of UMCM-3 F-43m?
Was the crystal size of UMCM-4 larger than that of UMCM-3?
What was the polydispersity index (PDI) of PHT before incorporation into UMCM-1?
Did the synthesis of UMCM-4 require a higher temperature than UMCM-3?
What was the purpose of using the SQUEEZE routine in the refinement of UMCM-4?
data.answer: To remove the diffraction contribution from highly disordered solvent molecules in the pores

data.question: Was the Langmuir surface area of UMCM-5 higher than its BET surface area?
What was the final R indices (I>2sigma(I)) for UMCM-3?
Did the synthesis of UMCM-5 result in a higher yield based on H3BTB compared to UMCM-3?
What was the method used for the synthesis of Zn4O(1,4-NDC)(BTB)4/3: UMCM-5?
data.answer: Dissolving H2NDC and H3BTB in N,N-diethylformamide, adding Zn(NO3)2·6H2O, sonicating, and heating to 85 °C

data.question: Was the molecular weight of PHT after incorporation into UMCM-1 lower than before?
